programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: Action adventure fantasy starring The Rock. In ancient times, powerful warrior Memnon presides over the desert with the aid of sorceress Cassandra. In an attempt to bring down this mighty duo, the assassin Mathayus is hired to kill Cassandra and thereafter become king of the last free tribes.n Chuck Russell - Director Dwayne Johnson - Mathayus, the Scorpion King Michael Clarke Duncan - Balthazar Steven Brand - Memnon Kelly Hu - Cassandra Bernard Hill - Philos Grant Heslov - Arpid Peter Facinelli - Prince Takmet Ralf Moeller - Thorak Sherri Howard - Queen Isis Roger Rees - King Pheron.

programme.title: The Portable Door
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Comedy, Mystery ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Paul Carpenter and Sophie Pettingel are lowly interns who begin working at the mysterious London firm JW Wells & Co. Charismatic villains Humphrey Wells, the CEO of the company, and middle manager Dennis Tanner are disrupting the world of magic by bringing modern corporate strategy to ancient magical practices. Paul and Sophie eventually discover the true agenda of the vast corporation where they work. Fantasy adventure, starring Christoph Waltz and Sam Neill Jeffrey Walker - Director Christoph Waltz - Humphrey Wells Sam Neill - Dennis Tanner Patrick Gibson - Paul Carpenter Sophie Wilde - Sophie Pentigel Miranda Otto - Countess Judy Damon Herriman - Monty Smith-Gregg Jessica De Gouw - Rosie Tanner.

programme.title: Transformers One
programme.sub-title: Drama, Sci Fi, Animation, Action, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ PG
programme.desc: Years before the sentient robots became arch enemies, Optimus Prime and Megatron were friends on their home planet of Cybertron. However, their feud changes the universe forever. programme.title: The Cinema List: Jurassic (2025)
programme.desc: Welcome to a Cinema List 65 million years in the making, going through the best moments from the Jurassic franchise - from the 1993 original to Jurassic World: Dominion.

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Drama, Children's, Animation, Family, Fantasy ║ 2022 ║ PG
programme.desc: Animated fantasy featuring the voice of Hugh Laurie. programme.title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Action, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical, Sci Fi, Children's ║ 2019 ║ U
programme.desc: Five years after events of the first film, teenager Finn has rebuilt Bricksburg into a post-apocalyptic wasteland. When Emmet is plagued by a vision of an impending cataclysm, he and Lucy fight to protect their beloved city from invaders. programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 12
programme.desc: Supernatural adventure starring Paul Rudd, featuring Bill Murray and Dan Aykroyd. The spook-hunting Spengler family joins forces with the original Ghostbusters, whose work is continuing via a secret research lab. When an ancient artefact is discovered and releases an evil force, the team must work together to prevent the dawning of a new Ice Age Gil Kenan - Director Paul Rudd - Gary Grooberson Carrie Coon - Callie Spengler Mckenna Grace - Phoebe Spengler Finn Wolfhard - Trevor Spengler Bill Murray - Peter Venkman Dan Aykroyd - Raymond \Ray\ Stantz Annie Potts - Janine Melnitz Ernie Hudson - Winston Zeddemore William Atherton - Walter Peck.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Supernatural horror comedy sequel starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega. In the decades since narrowly avoiding marriage to the lascivious demon Betelgeuse, Lydia Deetz has found fame as a TV occultist. Her teenage daughter, Astrid, is sceptical and distant, still mourning the death of her father some years before. But then Astrid has her own perilous brush with the beyond - and her despairing mother realises there's only one being who can help her out.. programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.sub-title: Action, Romance, Drama, Sci Fi, Fantasy ║ 2015 ║ 12
programme.desc: Decades on from the creation of Jurassic Park, a fully operational attraction filled with genetically engineered dinosaurs has been opened on the island. programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Drama, Action, Sci Fi, Thriller ║ 2024 ║ 12
programme.desc: Monster action adventure starring Rebecca Hall, Brian Tyree Henry and Dan Stevens. Since the Titans' last confrontation, Kong has decamped underground and is exploring the vast, fantastical world of "Hollow Earth". programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller starring Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke and Mark Rylance. In 2045, society's main entertainment is an ultra-immersive virtual reality simulation called the "OASIS". programme.title: The Mummy
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Horror, Thriller, Sci Fi ║ 1999 ║ 12
programme.desc: Period horror adventure starring Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz. programme.title: Voyagers
programme.sub-title: Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action, Mystery ║ 2021 ║ 15
programme.desc: Thirty young men and women are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is what's outside the ship or who they're becoming inside it. In the decades since narrowly avoiding marriage to the lascivious demon Betelgeuse, Lydia Deetz has found fame as a TV occultist. programme.title: The Cinema List: Men In Black Films
programme.desc: A look at the blockbusting fantasy comedies, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones and more.

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: Science-fiction horror starring Keri Russell and Josh Hamilton. programme.title: Afraid
programme.sub-title: Horror, Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 15
programme.desc: Computer engineering company executive Curtis is coerced into testing a new digital assistant named AIA to secure a lucrative business contract with two tech geniuses. At first, the omnipresent artificial intelligence simplifies day-to-day life. However, AIA becomes dangerously protective of the clan. programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller based on the MTV animated series, starring Charlize Theron. In 2415, the human survivors of a killer virus live in a walled hi-tech paradise called Bregna. programme.desc: Action horror thriller starring Jason Statham and Li Bingbing. programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring Kurt Russell and James Spader. programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes' immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venom's hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes' immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venom's hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. programme.title: Premier League Years 2019-2020
programme.desc: A chance to look back at a dramatic - and unprecedented - 2019-20 season in the Premier League, from the season's start in August to its late, coronavirus-impacted finish in July.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games: B'ming/A.Villa
programme.desc: A classic Premier League clash between Birmingham and Aston Villa in 2002. There was an intense atmosphere at St Andrew's with just a single point separating the bitter rivals.

programme.title: PL Greatest: WBA v Man Utd 2013
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, West Bromwich Albion take on Man Utd back in 2013 in a ten-goal thriller in what was Sir Alex Ferguson's final game in charge.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Cardiff v Liverpool
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Cardiff City take on Liverpool at the Cardiff City Stadium back in 2014, in a match that saw nine goals and a Luis Suarez hat-trick.

programme.title: Best of Wenger: L'pool/Arsenal 09
programme.desc: Remember a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Liverpool and Arsenal play out an absolute thriller at Anfield that saw Arsenal striker Andrey Arshavin steal the show.

programme.title: Best Premier League Goals 20/21
programme.desc: A selection of incredible strikes during the 2020-2021 Premier League season, including stunners from Mohamed Salah, Mason Mount, Kevin De Bruyne and many more.

programme.title: PL 100 Club: Harry Kane
programme.desc: A celebration of some of the finest goalscorers in the history of the Premier League. Here, enjoy the best of Tottenham Hotspur striker Harry Kane's top flight strikes.

programme.title: Best PL Goals: Manchester United
programme.desc: Enjoy the best Premier League goals scored by Manchester United over the years. See strikes from legends of the game including Ryan Giggs, David Beckham and more.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Arsenal/Spurs 08
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Arsenal meet Tottenham Hotspur in the north London derby in 2008-09 season, in a match that saw a stunning comeback.

programme.title: Best of Wenger: Man U/Arsenal '98
programme.desc: Remember a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Arsenal visit Alex Ferguson's Manchester United at Old Trafford back in the 1997-98 season.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Man Utd/Everton 2012

programme.desc: Miles Harrison picks the second test from the 1997 British & Irish Lions tour for a 'Rugby Retro' flashback. None other than Jeremy Guscott joins Miles and James Gemmell to talk about it.

programme.title: Lions v Argentina 2025 Hlts
programme.desc: Andy Farrell's British and Irish Lions, captained by Maro Itoje, kickstart their summer against Argentina at Dublin's Aviva Stadium before heading Down Under. (20.06).

programme.title: WTA Final: Merida
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned in the final of the Merida Open Akron, a WTA Tour 500 event held in Mexico. (02.03).

programme.title: ATP Final: s'Hertogenbosch
programme.desc: Zizou Bergs and Gabriel Diallo each get a second shot at ATP Tour glory in the 's-Hertogenbosch final. Diallo overcame Bergs in their only prior meeting earlier this year in Madrid. (15.06).

programme.title: EFL 02/03: Sheff Utd v Wolves
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic English Football League clash. Here, Sheffield United and Wolves meet in the First Division play-off final at the Millennium Stadium in Cardiff back in 2003.

programme.title: EFL 06/07: N. Forest v Yeovil
programme.desc: Relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Nottingham Forest face Yeovil in their Sky Bet League One play-off semi-final second leg at the City Ground in 2007.

programme.title: EFL 08/09: Cardiff v Swansea
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Cardiff City meet Swansea City in a thrilling south Wales derby at Ninian Park in 2009.

programme.title: EFL 08/09: Millwall v Scunthorpe
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Millwall face Scunthorpe at Wembley Stadium in the League 1 play-off final in 2009.

programme.title: Nick Dougherty's Tee Time Tips
programme.desc: Nick Dougherty returns to share his expertise with an episode of Tee Time Tips, from the host venue of the 2023 BMW PGA Championship, Wentworth Club in Surrey.

programme.title: Nick Dougherty's Tee Time Tips
programme.desc: Nick Dougherty returns to share his expertise with an episode of Tee Time Tips, from the host venue of the 2024 BMW PGA Championship, Wentworth Club in Surrey.

programme.title: Best of The OpenZone 2024
programme.desc: A look at the best moments from The Open Zone during 2024.

programme.title: EFL 09/10: Sheff Utd v Sheff Weds
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Sheffield United and Sheffield Wednesday meet in a thrilling Steel City derby in September 2009.

programme.title: EFL 10/11: Peterborough v So'ton
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Peterborough and Southampton meet in an eight-goal thriller in League 1 in February 2011.

programme.title: EFL 12/13: Watford v Leicester
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Watford meet Leicester City in the famous second leg of their Championship play-off semi-final in May 2013.

programme.title: EFL 13/14: Sheff Weds v Leeds Utd
programme.desc: Relive a classic match from the Football League. Here, Yorkshire rivals Sheffield Wednesday and Leeds United meet at Hillsborough in January 2014 in a memorable game for the Owls.

programme.title: Women's 2nd T20: ENG v IND
programme.desc: Charlotte Edwards' England welcome a touring India to Bristol for the second T20I in their five-match series.

programme.title: 1st Test'25 Day3: ENG v IND Hlts
programme.desc: Day three of the opening Test match between England and India at Headingley. Ollie Pope's ninth Test century helped the hosts fight back in their day two reply to the tourists. (22.06).

programme.title: Ladies European Tour Golf Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2025 Amundi German Masters, a Ladies European Tour event held at Green Eagle Golf Courses near Hamburg.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the PGA Tour's Rocket Classic, taking place at Detroit Golf Club in Michigan. Australia's Cam Davis claimed the win at this event last season.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Bournemouth/L'Pool '16
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Bournemouth, their stunning 4-3 comeback win over Liverpool in 2016.
